scenarios.name: Canvas Component Create completes successfully
scenarios.given: the system is initialized and ready for Canvas Component Create operations
scenarios.when: a valid Canvas Component Create request is processed
scenarios.then: the operation completes without errors and emits success events

scenarios.name: Canvas Component Create validates input parameters
scenarios.given: the Canvas Component Create handler chain is active
scenarios.when: an invalid or malformed request is received
scenarios.then: validation errors are captured and appropriate error events are emitted

scenarios.name: Canvas Component Create handler chain executes in order
scenarios.given: all 6 handlers are registered for Canvas Component Create
scenarios.when: the orchestration sequence is triggered
scenarios.then: handlers execute in sequence: resolveTemplate → registerInstance → createNode → renderReact → notifyUi → enhanceLine

scenarios.name: Canvas Component Create emits expected topics
scenarios.given: the Canvas Component Create sequence is executing
scenarios.when: each phase of the sequence completes
scenarios.then: the following topics are emitted: canvas:component:resolve-template, canvas:component:register-instance, canvas:component:create (+3 more)

scenarios.name: Canvas Component Create handles failures gracefully
scenarios.given: the Canvas Component Create operation is in progress
scenarios.when: an unexpected error occurs during execution
scenarios.then: the system logs the error, emits failure events, and maintains consistent state

scenarios.name: Canvas Component Create records telemetry metrics
scenarios.given: telemetry collection is enabled for Canvas Component Create
scenarios.when: the operation completes (success or failure)
scenarios.then: duration, success/failure counts, and relevant metadata are recorded
